p: The determination of basic crystallographic information and chemical composition set the stage for optimizing the synthesis conditions. Powder diffraction patterns with LaB 6 as an internal standard resulted in lattice parameters of a=4.4868(2) Å, b=10.1066(5) Å, and c=9.0753(4) Å. The optimized synthesis produced ingots containing specimen of sufficient size and quality for single crystal X‐ray diffraction. These were isolated from the crude product by leaching with 0.1 m NaOH.
